586.title: Yeh Rishta
586.description: A personal tragedy creates a rift in Abhimanyu and Akshara’s marital life. Years later, when destiny offers a second chance, will the duo embrace love?

1260118821.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
1260118821.description: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M’Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers after the death of beloved King T’Challa.
1260118821.crisp: Some Intense Sequences, Mild Language, Fantasy Violence

1260128386.title: Anger Tales
1260128386.description: Four people, four stories, one problem and only one solution - revolt!

1260132190.title: Kaduva
1260132190.description: An intense rivalry with IG Joseph lands Kaduva in jail. But when he gets released, the battle for supremacy continues, wherein losing is not an option.

1260132510.title: The Legend
1260132510.description: A sophisticated scholar Saravanan arrives at his native town to serve the people. But chaos ensues when he lands in the crosshairs of medical mafia.

1260132522.title: Chashni
1260132522.description: As different as chalk and cheese, Chandni and Roshni grow up as inseparable sisters. What happens when a tragedy sours their relationship?

1540022076.title: India Win Series, Enter WTC Final
1540022076.description: India drew the fourth Mastercard Test against Australia to win the Border-Gavaskar Trophy and enter the ICC World Test Championship Final
1540022076.line2: India Win Series, Enter WTC Final

1540022631.title: Resolute Lions Too Good for Giants
1540022631.description: Asia Lions dominated in all departments as they dismantled World Giants in a rain curtailed match in Legends League Cricket Masters 2023
1540022631.line2: Resolute Lions Too Good for Giants
